author: cbs8
title: LifeCell Releases Their All-in-One Anti-Aging Treatment
text:
LifeCell will be releasing their new and improved All-in-One Anti-Aging Treatment.
Hollywood, Florida (PRWEB) October 25, 2015
This is a great update to their anti-aging skincare line, originally made for both genders. This line for women focuses on women’s skin and their daily routine. The new and improved All-in-One Anti-Aging Treatment will have all the products fit into one. LifeCell’s All-in-One Anti-Aging Treatment is made to protect the skin from aging and keep the skin young.
“We decided to release LifeCell’s All-in-One Anti-Aging Treatment due to demand from our clients,” said the CEO of LifeCell. “Women are starting to take care of their skin more and more every day, and we want to help!”
LifeCell’s All-in-One Anti-Aging Treatment is unique because its products are made to protect and revitalize the skin. The Anti-Aging Cream is made to rejuvenate the skin with firmness and hydration. There will be no more need to worry about irritation. Made with exclusive ingredients geared to boost collagen production. This cream will be an essential part of every woman’s skincare routine,;LifeCell has made it a point that they will change the way women think of aging.
In addition to their All-in-One Anti-Aging Treatment, LifeCell is making their way into the daily hustle and bustle. LifeCell is releasing their SPF 30 BB Cream. The BB Cream is made to protect the skin and keep it hydrated throughout the day. Perfect for those women who are out in the sun or do activities outside. When it comes to preventing wrinkles and fine lines, LifeCell advocates the use of SPF protection. That’s why LifeCell includes it in some of their products to keep their customers protected to maintain their youth.
LifeCell has also taken a new direction in the way they will promote to women. They adopted a new motto: “Youthful Skin at ANY Age” will be their tag line for their skincare products. Let’s not forget their main products that have been raving the skincare industry for years, this new and improved All-in-One Anti-Aging Treatment by LifeCell is sure to make its impact. In the meantime, you can learn more about their main products by visiting: lifecellcream.com
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13041500.htm
